sp <- xts(price, order.by=date)
vol<-c(18055269,31706091,29179613,23721255,21846692,19043123,25716220,32070338,23141291,28576533,23407632,38118119,50119952,55061292,45907509,34606444,42600813,46214756,43514523,31306234,37410591,45807808,30900457,25707560,46554379,104448048,82299178,31192550,65939265,42917236,76396174,45492993,26985776,36165810,44699119,43847984,35289170,27337846,36945780,30391219,20645694,22887063,25100615,34264883,24254838,19396493,62989326,22440766,22335151,32977737,27000718,52974390,39487945,31100260,29924411,36427345,16996346,3603912,19029003,35813944,35465824,25268994,21777935,20476657,19946548,21608528,42756389,44768048,33230989,129890087,71901975,45206892,48975110,48176657,34443459,28500789,23751759,35597934,27530377,30693910,23577637,23771769,14834107,27702737,28187541,16417815,22422097,26737899,13450610,16486294,17673270,25770776,49667788,96587458,36652094,31257480,27714384,30375441,25277266,24192851,22028933,30189360,36081120,36932041,49506679,61142624,40708701)
sp<-cbind(sp,vol)
colnames(sp)<-c("Open","High","Low","Close","Volume")
chartSeries(sp,theme = chartTheme("black"),up.col='red',dn.col='green')

//繪製圓點
//x為K棒位置, y為收盤價
addPoints(x = 1:10, y = sp[1:10, 4], col="white")
